amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 116-154 to require the Director of National Intelligence to submit a repor t to Congress which includes aggregate demographic data and other information regarding their diversity and inclusion efforts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Schiff.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
